document_data.caption: A map showing the White Bull in central Aithelar.
document_data.name: the White Bull
document_data.mainbody: The '''White Bull''' was a [[tavern]] found in the town of [[Aithelar]] in [[Callidyrr]] on the [[Moonshae Isles]] in {{YearlinkName|1345}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The tavern was located near the center of town at the intersection of [[Callidyrr Ride]] and [[Aerynn's Street]].
document_data.Activities: The White Bull provided a fine dining experience to its patrons.
